text:
With the arrival of the #COVID19 #vaccine in 🇨🇦, NACI & SOGC have released statements for preg/BFing individuals. While our platform is primarily on Insta w/ >14K followers, we are cross-posting this one for all the scientists/academics/clinicians/media on twitter.
